thread.section_title: Snapfish.co.uk Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Snapfish.co.uk | www.snapfish.co.uk
thread.title: Adam

author: Adam
title: Adam
text:
I have now done four photo albums with Snapfish and would recommend them to my friends for three reasons :-
1/ The quality of the photo albums are extremely high and will be cherished for ever
2/ The online portal to load the photos and design the books was simple to use and reliable
3/ When I did have a question - their live chat feature was a huge benefit. Great support!
